abstract: The Ohio-based company OM Group says it has signed a deal to buy EaglePicher Technologies in Joplin, Mo., for nearly $172 million.
snippet: The Ohio-based company OM Group says it has signed a deal to buy EaglePicher Technologies in Joplin, Mo., for nearly $172 million.
lead_paragraph: OM Group, a producer of specialty chemicals, said Wednesday it had agreed to acquire EaglePicher Technologies for nearly $172 million, The Associated Press reported.

headline.main: OM Group to Buy EaglePicher Technologies
